title: Billy Steinberg: The Songwriter Who Made Hit Songs
summary: Billy Steinberg was a famous songwriter who wrote many popular songs. He helped create Madonna's big hit 'Like a Virgin' and other songs for stars like Whitney Houston and Cyndi Lauper. He was 75 years old when he died from cancer in Los Angeles. His family said he was a loving person and a great writer. He won awards like a Grammy for his work. Billy started writing songs in the 1980s with his friend Tom Kelly. Together, they made music that many people still love today. His songs often started as personal thoughts but became anthems that millions sang along to. He is remembered for his honesty and the way his music connected with people.
